SEARCH
Package org.wmn4j.representation.geometric

Class PointSet<T extends Point<T>>

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.representation.geometric.PointSet<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the point type to use in for the point set
public final class PointSet<T extends Point<T>> extends Object
Point set representation of a score. The points are sorted lexicographically in the point set.

This class is immutable.

    • getPosition

      public Optional<Position> getPosition(T point)
      Returns the score position (see Position) of the point in the score if the point exists in the point set. Otherwise, returns empty.
      Parameters:
      point - the point for which the position ois returned if it's present
      Returns:
      the score position if the point exists in the point set

    • getPosition

      public Optional<PatternPosition> getPosition(PointPattern<T> pattern, T translator)
      Returns the position of the translated pattern in the score (see PatternPosition) if all points in the point pattern are present in this point set. Otherwise, returns empty.
      Parameters:
      pattern - the point pattern for which the pattern position is returned
      translator - a translator by which the points are translated
      Returns:
      the position of the translated pattern in the score if present, otherwise, empty
